review.reviewBody: The NON VEG THALI was absolutely amazing! Flavorful, perfect spice level, generous portion, fresh and very tasty- I'll be ordering it again!! This is my new favorite place for authentic Indian food!
it was good though but a kind of spiciness is missing if they put it in potatoes then it can be the best.
Really tasty and good value.  I would definitely order from here again.

didn't get pickle or yoghurt with the METHI PRANTHA . tasty food but the chicken CHICKEN TIKKA MASALA  could have been made with lesser oil. the GULAB JAMUN (2PCS)  did not come with the syrup. all the breads were super soft.
The VEG THALI was overall good. The potion was large. If the mixed-veg could be less spicy and the naan could be less thick, it would be even better.
